components.label: This is step 1 of a journey

journeyStep.name: Login Form
journeyStep.description: User enters their credentials to access the application. This is the first step in the authentication process where users provide their username and password.

components.label: Customer Portfolio Management Engine
components.description: A system for managing customer portfolios.

cmdb.name: Customer Portfolio Management Engine
cmdb.description: A system for managing customer portfolios.

cmdbFacts.name: Customer Portfolio Management Engine
cmdbFacts.description: A system for managing customer portfolios.

platforms.comment: Mainframe platform for managing customer portfolios
Certain functionality has been already migrated to Azure

components.label: Trading Risk Assessment Gateway
components.description: Real-time risk assessment and monitoring system for trading operations. Evaluates market exposure and provides automated risk alerts. Integrates with multiple trading platforms to ensure compliance with risk management policies.

cmdb.name: Trading Risk Assessment Gateway
cmdb.description: Gateway service that performs real-time risk calculations and regulatory compliance checks for all trading activities.

cmdbFacts.name: Trading Risk Assessment Gateway
cmdbFacts.description: Gateway service that performs real-time risk calculations and regulatory compliance checks for all trading activities.

platforms.comment: Deployed on Azure infrastructure for scalability and real-time processing

components.label: Account Reconciliation Service
components.description: Automated reconciliation engine that matches transactions across multiple banking systems. Identifies discrepancies and generates exception reports for manual review.

cmdb.name: Account Reconciliation Service
cmdb.description: Microservice responsible for daily reconciliation processes across all account types and transaction sources.

cmdbFacts.name: Account Reconciliation Service
cmdbFacts.description: Microservice responsible for daily reconciliation processes across all account types and transaction sources.

platforms.comment: Running on on-premises infrastructure for data security compliance
Migrating batch processing components to Azure for better scalability

components.label: Payment Processing Hub
components.description: Central payment orchestration platform handling multiple payment methods and channels. Processes millions of transactions daily with real-time fraud detection. Supports both domestic and international payment networks.

cmdb.name: Payment Processing Hub
cmdb.description: High-throughput payment processing system with integrated fraud detection and multi-network routing capabilities.

cmdbFacts.name: Payment Processing Hub
cmdbFacts.description: High-throughput payment processing system with integrated fraud detection and multi-network routing capabilities.

platforms.comment: Fully Azure-native deployment for global scalability and high availability

components.label: Loan Origination Platform
components.description: End-to-end loan application processing system with automated underwriting capabilities. Integrates with credit bureaus and regulatory compliance frameworks.

cmdb.name: Loan Origination Platform
cmdb.description: Legacy COBOL-based loan origination system with modern API interfaces for digital banking integration.

cmdbFacts.name: Loan Origination Platform
cmdbFacts.description: Legacy COBOL-based loan origination system with modern API interfaces for digital banking integration.

repositories.description: Modern API wrapper for legacy loan system

platforms.comment: Core loan processing runs on z/OS mainframe for regulatory compliance and data integrity
New digital interfaces and APIs deployed on Azure for modern channel integration

components.label: Legacy Account Processing System
components.description: Legacy mainframe system for account processing and transaction management.

cmdb.name: Legacy Account Processing System
cmdb.description: Legacy mainframe system for account processing and transaction management.

cmdbFacts.name: Legacy Account Processing System
cmdbFacts.description: Legacy mainframe system for account processing and transaction management.

components.label: Machine Learning Fraud Detection
components.description: Advanced ML system for real-time fraud detection and risk assessment in banking transactions.

cmdb.name: Machine Learning Fraud Detection
cmdb.description: Advanced ML system for real-time fraud detection and risk assessment in banking transactions.

cmdbFacts.name: Machine Learning Fraud Detection

components.label: Mobile Banking Client
components.description: Native mobile application for iOS and Android providing comprehensive banking services to retail customers.

journeyStep.name: Account Balance View
journeyStep.description: The main account overview screen where users can view their current account balance, recent transactions, and quick action buttons. This screen serves as the primary dashboard after successful login, providing users with immediate access to their most important banking information.
